title: Belief in God is NOT the Key Difference Between Atheists and Christians
description:
Jordan Peterson teased the world with his answer as to whether or not he "believed" in "God". He was making a point that needled people over the facile divide between atheism and religion promoted by modernity. Atheists and Christians agree on way more than they disagree over, but they often don't dig deep enough to find where the relevant and more interesting differences lie. It's time to do that digging.
